All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ball
Abstract Ball class is the superclass of all concrete ball class in the game.
BallFactory
Ball Factory uses the factory design pattern to generate different types of ball in the game of Brick Destroyer.
BlackStoneBrick
Black Stone Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
Brick
Abstract Brick class is the superclass of all concrete brick class in the game.
Brick.ImpactDirection
 
BrickDestroyerMain
 
BrickFactory
Brick Factory uses the factory design pattern to generate different types of brick in the game of Brick Destroyer.
CementBrick
Cement Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
ClayBrick
Clay Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
Crack
Crack class contains the properties and behavior of a crackable brick class such as cement brick in the game of Brick Destroyer.
DebugConsoleController
Debug Console Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the debug console panel in the game of Brick Destroyer.
DebugConsoleModel
Debug Console Model is responsible to provide all the data needed to run the debug console panel.
Entity
This interface is used to ensure all entities will have the behavior to retrieve the basic properties of each entity's class in the game of Brick Destroyer.
GameBoardController
Game Board Controller handle all the user interaction on the Player object and set the view logic of the main game screen.
GameBoardModel
Game Board Model is responsible to provide all the data needed to run the view of the game.
GameBoardView
Game Board View is responsible to draw and the scene of the game.
GameLogic
Game logic contains all the basic behavior of how entities interact with each other and the overall state of the game.
HasteBrick
Haste Brick class is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
HomeMenuController
Home Menu Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the Home Menu in the game of Brick Destroyer.
InfoMenuController
Info Menu Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the Info Menu in the game of Brick Destroyer.
Levels
Levels class contains the properties and method for constructing the in-game levels of the game of Brick Destroyer.
Main
 
Movable
This interface is to ensure all movable entities will have the behavior of moving in the game of Brick Destroyer.
NameInputBoxController
Name Input Box Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the name input box in the game of Brick Destroyer.
PauseMenuController
Pause Menu Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the pause menu in the game of Brick Destroyer.
PauseMenuModel
Pause Menu Model is responsible to provide all the data needed to run the pause menu screen.
Player
Player is a concrete class used to represent the entities control by the player in the game of Brick Destroyer.
RubberBall
Rubber ball is a concrete class used to represent an object for the user to clear different types of brick in the game of Brick Destroyer.
SceneManager
Scene Manager manage all the screen swapping in the game of Brick Destroyer.
ScoreBoardController
Score Board Controller is responsible to show and handle all the user interaction with the score board in the game of Brick Destroyer.
ScoreBoardModel
Score Board Model is responsible to provide all the data needed to run the score board.
SteelBrick
Steel Brick is a concrete class used to represent one type of the obstacle in the game of Brick Destroyer.
